WorkItem.Description: I have used this editor on web page. When i try to get the text bu using Rte1.Text.trim(), it is giving blank string. I am not sure why it is behaving strange. I request you to please help me out.
WorkItem.Summary: Not able to get the Editor Content on code behind

Comments.Message: I have found that unless you switch to HTML view in the control, the Text property will not be populated correctly.  This is using a base install of the control.
